meanings.definition: In a way that causes something to break into many pieces.
meanings.sent1: The glass vase fell shatteringly to the floor.
meanings.sent2: The earthquake shook the building shatteringly.
meanings.sent3: The cat's attempt to balance on the shelf ended shatteringly.
meanings.sent4: The news of the accident hit her shatteringly.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the hammer hitting the mirror was shatteringly loud.

meanings.definition: In a way that is extremely shocking or upsetting.
meanings.sent1: The unexpected revelation left her shatteringly surprised.
meanings.sent2: The movie's plot twist was shatteringly unexpected.
meanings.sent3: His failed magic trick ended shatteringly.
meanings.sent4: The reality of the situation hit her shatteringly.
meanings.sent5: The thunderstorm outside was shatteringly loud.
